verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and prophesy to them, <S%H5012><s%>

and say, <S%H559><s%> You mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the watercourses <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys: <S%H1516><s%> Behold, <S%H935><s%> I, even I, will bring a sword <S%H2719><s%> on you, <S%H6><s%> and I will destroy your high places. <S%H1116><s%>

Your altars <S%H4196><s%> shall become desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and your incense altars <S%H4196><s%> shall be broken; <S%H7665><s%> and I will cast down <S%H5307><s%> your slain <S%H2491><s%> men before <S%H6440><s%> your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

I will lay <S%H5414><s%> the dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their idols; <S%H1544><s%> and I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> your bones <S%H6106><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> your altars. <S%H4196><s%>

In all your dwelling <S%H4186><s%> places the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be laid waste, <S%H2717><s%> and the high places <S%H1116><s%> shall be desolate; <S%H3456><s%> that your altars <S%H4196><s%> may be laid waste <S%H2717><s%> and made desolate, <S%H816><s%> and your idols <S%H1544><s%> may be broken <S%H7665><s%> and cease, <S%H7673><s%> and your incense altars <S%H2553><s%> may be cut down, <S%H1438><s%> and your works <S%H4639><s%> may be abolished. <S%H4229><s%>
The slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yet will I leave a remnant, <S%H3498><s%> in that you shall have some that escape <S%H6412><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> when you shall be scattered <S%H2219><s%> through the countries. <S%H776><s%>

Those of you that escape <S%H6412><s%> shall remember <S%H2142><s%> me among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where they shall be carried captive, <S%H7617><s%> how that I have been broken <S%H7665><s%> with their lewd <S%H2181><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> which has departed <S%H5493><s%> from me, <S%H5869><s%> and with their eyes, which play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols: <S%H1544><s%> and they shall loathe <S%H6962><s%> themselves <S%H6440><s%> in their own sight for the evils <S%H7451><s%> which they have committed <S%H6213><s%> in all their abominations. <S%H8441><s%>
They shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> I have not said <S%H1696><s%> in vain <S%H2600><s%> that I would do <S%H6213><s%> this evil to them. <S%H7451><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Strike <S%H5221><s%> with your hand, <S%H3709><s%> and stamp <S%H7554><s%> with your foot, <S%H7272><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Alas! <S%H253><s%> because of all the evil <S%H7451><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> by the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and by the pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

He who is far off <S%H7350><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of the pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> and he who is near <S%H7138><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and he who remains <S%H7604><s%> and is besieged <S%H5341><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the famine: <S%H7458><s%> thus will I accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my wrath on them. <S%H2534><s%>

You shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when their slain <S%H2491><s%> men shall be among <S%H8432><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> on every high <S%H7311><s%> hill, <S%H1389><s%> on all the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> and under every thick <S%H5687><s%> oak, <S%H424><s%> the places <S%H4725><s%> where they offered <S%H5414><s%> pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to all their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> on them, <S%H5414><s%> and make the land <S%H776><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> and waste, <S%H4923><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> toward Diblah, <S%H1689><s%> throughout all their habitations: <S%H4186><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
